languages.text: {n}Вам, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}истинному знатоку догматов веры{/d}, совершенно очевидно, что юноша изрек ересь. Путь любого праведника кончается у Золотого Трона, и нет большей награды в посмертии, чем зреть его свет.{/n}

{n}It is beyond obvious to you as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}true adept of the precepts of the faith{/d} that the young man's words are heresy. The path of every righteous soul ends at the foot of the Golden Throne, and there is no greater reward in death than to behold its light.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}истинному знатоку догматов веры{/d}, совершенно очевидно, что юноша изрек ересь. Путь любого праведника кончается у Золотого Трона, и нет большей награды в посмертии, чем зреть его свет.{/n}

{n}It is beyond obvious to you as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}true adept of the precepts of the faith{/d} that the young man's words are heresy. The path of every righteous soul ends at the foot of the Golden Throne, and there is no greater reward in death than to behold its light.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist für dich als {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}{mf|wahren Adepten|wahre Adeptin} der Gebote des Glaubens{/d} mehr als offensichtlich, dass die Worte des jungen Mannes ketzerisch sind. Der Weg jeder rechtschaffenen Seele endet vor dem Goldenen Thron, und es gibt im Tod keine größere Belohnung, als sein Licht zu erblicken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is beyond obvious to you as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}true adept of the precepts of the faith{/d} that the young man's words are heresy. The path of every righteous soul ends at the foot of the Golden Throne, and there is no greater reward in death than to behold its light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist für dich als {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}{mf|wahren Adepten|wahre Adeptin} der Gebote des Glaubens{/d} mehr als offensichtlich, dass die Worte des jungen Mannes ketzerisch sind. Der Weg jeder rechtschaffenen Seele endet vor dem Goldenen Thron, und es gibt im Tod keine größere Belohnung, als sein Licht zu erblicken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}authentique disciple des préceptes de la foi{/d}, la nature blasphématoire des propos du jeune homme vous crève les yeux. Toutes les âmes vertueuses sont appelées à comparaître au pied du Trône d'Or, et il n'y a pas de plus belle récompense dans la mort que de pouvoir en admirer la sainte lumière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is beyond obvious to you as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}true adept of the precepts of the faith{/d} that the young man's words are heresy. The path of every righteous soul ends at the foot of the Golden Throne, and there is no greater reward in death than to behold its light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}authentique disciple des préceptes de la foi{/d}, la nature blasphématoire des propos du jeune homme vous crève les yeux. Toutes les âmes vertueuses sont appelées à comparaître au pied du Trône d'Or, et il n'y a pas de plus belle récompense dans la mort que de pouvoir en admirer la sainte lumière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你对{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}国教教义与戒律了如指掌{/d}。这个年轻人的发言是明显的异端邪说，这一点委实再明显不过。每个正义的灵魂最终都会抵达黄金王座。对帝国的忠仆而言，若是能在死后看到祂的明光，这便是最大的恩赐。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is beyond obvious to you as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}true adept of the precepts of the faith{/d} that the young man's words are heresy. The path of every righteous soul ends at the foot of the Golden Throne, and there is no greater reward in death than to behold its light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你对{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}国教教义与戒律了如指掌{/d}。这个年轻人的发言是明显的异端邪说，这一点委实再明显不过。每个正义的灵魂最终都会抵达黄金王座。对帝国的忠仆而言，若是能在死后看到祂的明光，这便是最大的恩赐。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Como {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}verdader{mf|o|a} adept{mf|o|a} de los preceptos de la fe{/d}, te resulta extremadamente evidente que las palabras del joven son una herejía. La senda de toda alma justa acaba a los pies del Trono Dorado, y no hay mayor recompensa en la muerte que contemplar su luz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is beyond obvious to you as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}true adept of the precepts of the faith{/d} that the young man's words are heresy. The path of every righteous soul ends at the foot of the Golden Throne, and there is no greater reward in death than to behold its light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Como {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}verdader{mf|o|a} adept{mf|o|a} de los preceptos de la fe{/d}, te resulta extremadamente evidente que las palabras del joven son una herejía. La senda de toda alma justa acaba a los pies del Trono Dorado, y no hay mayor recompensa en la muerte que contemplar su luz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}信仰の教えの真の熟達者{/d}であるあなたには、その若者の言葉が異端であることはもはや疑う余地はない。すべての正義の魂の道は黄金の玉座の足元で終わり、死においてその光を見ることに勝ものはない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is beyond obvious to you as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}true adept of the precepts of the faith{/d} that the young man's words are heresy. The path of every righteous soul ends at the foot of the Golden Throne, and there is no greater reward in death than to behold its light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}信仰の教えの真の熟達者{/d}であるあなたには、その若者の言葉が異端であることはもはや疑う余地はない。すべての正義の魂の道は黄金の玉座の足元で終わり、死においてその光を見ることに勝ものはない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}Gerçek bir inanan olduğundan{/d} genç adamın ağzından çıkan sözlerin düpedüz kâfirlik olduğu senin için çok açık. Her bir haklı ruhun yolu, nihayetinde Altın Taht'ın eteklerinde son bulur ve ölümde onun nurunu görebilmekten daha yüce bir ödül yoktur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is beyond obvious to you as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}true adept of the precepts of the faith{/d} that the young man's words are heresy. The path of every righteous soul ends at the foot of the Golden Throne, and there is no greater reward in death than to behold its light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}Gerçek bir inanan olarak{/d}, genç adamın ağzından çıkan sözlerin düpedüz kâfirlik olduğu senin için çok açık. Her bir haklı ruhun yolu nihayetinde Altın Taht'ın eteklerinde son bulur ve ölümde onun nurunu görebilmekten daha yüce bir ödül yoktur.{/n}
